shortdesc.ph: Starts the audio capturing device test.

section.p: This method tests whether the audio sampling device works properly. After calling this method, the SDK will trigger a callback at the set time interval, reporting uid = 0 and the volume information of the collection device.
section.note: Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.

plentry.pd: The time interval(ms) at which the SDK triggers the callback. We recommend a setting greater than 200 ms. It must not be less than 10 milliseconds, otherwise the callback will not be received.
